name: Introducing Wolfi – the first Linux (Un)distro designed for securing the software supply chain
summary: The massive push for software supply-chain integrity and transparency has left organizations struggling to secure their pipelines and manage vulnerabilities. Existing tooling doesn’t support supply chain security natively and requires users to bolt on critical features like signatures, provenance, and software bills of material (SBOM). Everything you need to know about securing the software supply chain.
